replies.body: This was possibly the best buff to a champion in my opinion. I remember when i played my first game of singed feeling the buff power inside me. Unfortunately the enemy Garen didn't read the notes and kept spouting for everyone to report me for BMing as singed by laughing at him. This little kid's jimmies were in fact rustled.

Up there with this buff was two more: 1) Master Yi in this recent 5.17 having his dance animation speed up in relation to his overall movement speed. 2) Sona in patch 4.13 caused champions hit by her ultimate (which has always invoked them to dance) to now dance 50% faster while they are "stunned"!
Does that mean Yi with homeguard will dance ridiculously fast? I need to try it NAO! {{summoner:4}}

How about a light rework to buff him up?
Mechanics?
Something?

Patch 5.18
Singed now laughs when an enemy is poisoned by his Q.

Patch 5.19
Singed now laughs repeatedly for the full duration of his R.

Patch 5.20

Singed laugh drove mad every other champion, and everytime he laughs every nearby champion laughs too.

Patch 5.21

Game now officially renamed to League of Laughing

I would have tought

Patch 5.22
AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH

Patch 5.24
LoL now properly renamed to LOL for 'Laugh Out Loud'.

Rammus has now received a new laugh audio file.

Patch 5.23
League players are driven mad, accounts of over 100,000 toxic players committing suicide. #LaughterIsTheBestMedicine.

5.25
Ranged basic attacks now make laughing sounds on impact.

Patch 5.27

Singed's Q is officially renamed to Laughing Gas

Patch 5.26

Darius now laughs continuously throught the game when he faces a Singed.
Patch 5.18 *Singed never stops laughing and is heard globally at a unchangeable max volume laugh.
Oh my yes.
I'm sorry you aren't good with singed. He doesn't need a rework.

If laughter is the best medicine, {{champion:44}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:44}} should laugh as they heal people then. Also Janna {{champion:40}}
You forgot {{champion:99}}
Every time you right click...
what about {{champion:222}} i mean you dont even have to spam the laugh for her to laugh
You should make {{champion:222}}  laugh hysterically when her passive is on
Or at least a hearty giggle
Riot had better do this!!!!!
How'd that taste? {{champion:27}}
Tastes like purple! {{champion:117}}
{{champion:36}} You know what else tastes like purple?
*Police Sirens*
An echo of Teemo laughter needs to be a thing every time someone steps on one of his shrooms
Sions coming{{champion:14}}
Dank meme
Yes, how can I help you?
Skinny dude with a backpack and pointless shield is able to throw people like a WWE wrestler. Seems legit.
Since when was a toxic gas container considered a backpack?
There's a school terrorism joke in there somewhere.
please make his laugh hearable trough all the map
Is this how laughing gas was created?
Still not as bad as a Nunu Bot laugh.
I'm surprised to see this on the home screen of league. What relevance does it have? When will we get a new champion? Its been over 2 months...
Don't worry. "THEY" are coming.
WHAT DOES IT MEANNNNNN {{champion:25}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
DOUBLE RAINBOW{{champion:34}} air +{{champion:89}} light/sun +{{champion:105}} water = {{champion:44}} rainbow
That's a joke, right???? I can't tell if its a joke or not. O.O
They're coming to take your waifu and chiles she birfed. Don't worry, once they take yur waifu then you can control them.
its real, it has happened to me once, they ARE coming
No, it hasn't even been 2 months. Tahm Kench {{champion:223}}  was released July 9th. Please check your info before you complain...
Are you really nitpicking 6 days?
How about a drink to go with that laugh?
